# Data Preparation

```{r}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)

pinBillsExemps <- read_csv("./Output/4C_joined_PINs_bills_and_exemptions.csv")

ptaxdf <- read_csv("./Output/ptaxsim_muni_level_2006-2021.csv")

incentPINs <- read_csv("./Output/7_output_incentive_pins.csv")

nicknames <- readxl::read_excel("./Necessary_Files/muni_shortnames.xlsx")

class_dict <- read_csv("./Necessary_Files/class_dict_expanded.csv") %>% 
  mutate(class_code = as.character(class_code))

source("helper_tc_muninames.R")
```
